Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.socket

Class SocketClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.socket.SocketClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualServer, VirtualView, Remote
public class SocketClientHandler extends Object implements VirtualView, VirtualServer
This class represents the handler of a client connected to the server via socket. It implements both the VirtualView and VirtualServer interfaces, so it can receive messages from the server and send messages to the client. It also has a reference to the controller and the socket server, so it can interact with them.

  • Method Details

    • runVirtualView

      public void runVirtualView() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method is called when the client is connected to the server. It reads the messages sent by the client and calls the corresponding methods.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the input stream
      ClassNotFoundException - if the class of a serialized object cannot be found
